entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas.

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late in the evening. Snow mixed with rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
